doc.title: Mysterious Disappearance of a Policeman
doc.plot: "Bridget is entertaining the 'Sparrow Cop,' when her mistress unexpectedly comes in. Bridget hides the 'Copper' behind a sheet hanging on a line in the kitchen. The mistress discovers him, but when she throws the sheet aside she finds only his helmet on a shelf, and his shoes on the floor beneath the sheet."
